resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Tap an option below to get started (try \"amount!\")
FuturePlanner can\'t graph extremely large numbers.
FuturePlanner encountered either an extremely large number (e.g. more than 30 digits) or was asked to divide by zero. Please check your income, expenses, initial funds, and other inputs.
You need to increase FuturePlanner\'s forecast length to do that by unlocking it in the store. Do you want to go there now?
No items to show. Are you logged into Google Play and connected to the internet?
Reduces the amount by the given percentage; useful for things like income taxes or discounts
Increases the amount by the given percentage; useful for things like sales tax or bonuses
Spreads the amount over the course of a year
Spreads the amount over the course of a month
Spreads the amount over the course of a week
Spreads the amount over the course of a fortnight
Spreads the amount over the course of a day
Causes the amount to be applied only after the start date
Causes the amount to be applied only before the end date
Causes the amount to be applied exactly once on the given date

"FuturePlanner (the "Software") is tool for rapidly exploring ideas. It is NOT a substitute for a financial planner. Always consult a registered financial planner before making any important life or financial decisions.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. BY USING THE SOFTWARE YOU AGREE AND CONSENT TO THESE TERMS.

FuturePlanner is authored and brought to you by Luminesim Simulation and Analytics (www.luminesim.com). We build simulation tools with clients to explore new policy ideas and to rethink and improve the systems that affect our lives. If you want test your vision for change in a risk-free environment before bringing it to the real world, we want to hear from you. Contact us today at info@luminesim.com.

"FuturePlanner makes use of the following external projects: MPAndroidChart (www.github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart) Project Lombok (www.projectlombok.org) SimpleFlatMapper (www.simpleflatmapper.org) SLF4J (www.slf4j.org)"
Tap one of the options below to build the amount. For example, \"amount\" can be used to get started.
